text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence Wonder how Trump fans will feel when all of a sudden there family are sick potentially with the #coronavirus but not enough tests or ability to help. Will you be unhappy with our president or will you believe once again it’s somebody else such as Obama who left four years ago?
